tabs.tabDescription: Kids pizza - pizza without any fats. It's more usefull than meat or vegan pizza. That's rather good for children under 12 y.o.
Vegan pizza - pizza, who doesn't like the taste of meat. We add there mushrooms, vegetables, fruit and PBM.
Classical meat pizza - pizza for those people, who likes any meat. The most popular pizza in our pizzeria.

cards.pizzaDescription: Spicy pepperoni, increased portion of mozzarella, tomatoes, signature tomato sauce.
Signature tomato sauce, mozzarella, spicy chorizo, sweet pepper.
Pizza with ham and too much cheese. For those people who loves a lot of cheese.
Full vegan pizza without any meat and pepperoni. There are only vegetables, cheese and fruits.
Champignons, tomatoes, sweet peppers, red onions, cheese cubes, mozzarella, signature tomato sauce, Italian herbs.
Increased portion of mozzarella, tomatoes, Italian herbs, signature tomato sauce.
Ham, champignons, increased portion of mozzarella, special tomato sauce.
